short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to extract Makecode Blocks as SVGs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A (very) simple script that allows Makecode blocks export as SVG (vector graphics).
Also, an option is available to change the blocks stroke to black, in order to better identify blocks from each other.
